label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_015
content:
## 2024-06-10 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 108
- Active: 103
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 37
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 5

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 35
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 33.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.9
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 345.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 49.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 26.2
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.0
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.4
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 3.1
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.3

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.0
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 43.2
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 12.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 297.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 46.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 21.9
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.6
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 5.3
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.1

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.4
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.0
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.3
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 277.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 59.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.7
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.4
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.9
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 6.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.0

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 209
- Sessions Attended: 188
- Attendance Rate (%): 85.6

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.3
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3
- WBC (k) Mean: 6.9
- WBC (k) SD: 1.1
- Platelets (k) Mean: 240
- Platelets (k) SD: 45
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.09
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.15
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 98.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 20.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 11.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 8.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1561, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1555, Description: constipation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1543, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1522, Description: 6MWT not performed due to facility scheduling, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: PM-PD-1515, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 12 sites
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance

### Notes
- Week 15: Pain management assessments on track. 108 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
